ygData.msgSnippet: Straight Shot looks to Tucson and then to the queen.  She knew that the best thing anyone could ever give another being, is sanctuary from destruction.  Well,

Straight Shot looks to Tucson and then to the queen.  She knew that the bes=
t thing anyone could ever give another being, is sanctuary from destruction=
.

" Well, Physically, we have no tangable items ta give away, but we can o=
ffer sanctuary."

Tucson pivots his tires and keeps a reasonable distance f=
rom the queen.

" Yes, she's right, we can offer you something that no othe=
r faction is capable of offering you.  Sanctuary.  That means you can live =
your lives freely without hinderence from the Autobots and if anyone tries =
to violate your sanctuary, I promise to upold my end of the bargain and I w=
ill see to it, that you are left undisturbed.  As a matter of fact, we coul=
d keep this part of the tunnels guarded at all times, and yes, if possible,=
 find a way to offer you energon as an alternate energy source.  That way, =
you wouldn't have to feed off of any of us.  Everyone wins in this scenario=
."

Quickstride nodds.

"Yeah, can't get any better than that, and that's w=
ay better than just getting a mass of shinny trinkets."

Tucson backs a way=
 slowly, to honorably uphold his end if the bargain.

"In return all we ask=
 is to have Rodimus returned to us.  Do this, and I can assure your sanctua=
ry."

He waits to hear the queen's answer.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, =

 return for being a good sport."

ces buzzed slightly as she spoke,

d?"

nge

fficult to make out clearly. Also there was shadowy movement that
